statements: SELECT * FROM VirtualObjectsInventory;
SELECT object_id, object_name FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT object_name, description FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM VirtualObjectsInventory ORDER BY object_name DESC;
SELECT object_id, quantity FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT object_name, quantity FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY object_name ASC
SELECT object_id, object_name, description FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE object_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY quantity DESC, object_id ASC
SELECT object_name, description FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE object_id = 'a6ebabcf-371f-4b30-82e1-289f8cf6ec10' OR quantity < 10
SELECT object_id, object_name, quantity, description FROM VirtualObjectsInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity ASC, object_name DESC
SELECT * FROM virtual_objects;
SELECT object_name, quantity FROM virtual_objects WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, object_name FROM virtual_objects ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT scene_name, scene_description FROM ar_scenes;
SELECT vo.object_name, as.scene_name FROM virtual_objects vo JOIN ar_scenes as ON vo.id = as.object_id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_objects WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY object_type DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, object_name, quantity FROM virtual_objects WHERE id = 3;
SELECT scene_name, scene_description FROM ar_scenes WHERE scene_description LIKE '%exciting%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT object_name, object_type, quantity FROM virtual_objects WHERE object_type = 'furniture';
SELECT v.object_name, s.scene_name FROM virtual_objects v INNER JOIN ar_scenes s ON v.id = s.object_id WHERE s.id BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY v.object_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_objects;
SELECT id, object_name, category FROM virtual_objects WHERE category = 'Furniture';
SELECT object_name, description FROM virtual_objects WHERE id = 3;
SELECT scene_id, location, DATE_FORMAT(date_added, '%Y-%m-%d') AS added_date FROM scenes;
SELECT inventory_id, object_name, quantity FROM object_inventory INNER JOIN virtual_objects ON object_inventory.object_id = virtual_objects.id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_objects WHERE category = 'Furniture';
SELECT object_name, description FROM virtual_objects WHERE id = 3;
SELECT scene_id, date_added FROM scenes ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT object_name, category FROM virtual_objects WHERE object_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT * FROM object_inventory WHERE scene_id = 5 AND quantity >= 10;
SELECT * FROM VirtualObjects;
SELECT name, description FROM VirtualObjects WHERE category='furniture';
SELECT id, name, location FROM ARScenes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ObjectInstances WHERE position_x > 0 AND position_y > 0;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM VirtualObjects WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, description, category FROM VirtualObjects WHERE category = 'Furniture' AND quantity < 50;

SELECT v.name, a.name AS scene_name, oi.position_x, oi.position_y, oi.position_z FROM VirtualObjects v JOIN ObjectInstances oi ON v.id = oi.virtual_object_id JOIN ARScenes a ON a.id = oi.ar_scene_id WHERE a.location = 'Living Room';
SELECT u.username, u.email, a.location AS scene_location FROM Users u JOIN ARScenes a ON u.id = a.id;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS objects_count, AVG(quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM ObjectInstances;
SELECT * FROM virtual_objects;
SELECT object_name, object_type FROM virtual_objects WHERE object_color = 'blue';
SELECT scene_id, scene_name, created_at FROM ar_scenes WHERE scene_location = 'park';
SELECT object_id, quantity, last_updated FROM object_inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT object_name, object_type FROM virtual_objects WHERE object_color = 'Red';
SELECT * FROM ar_scenes WHERE scene_location = 'Living Room' AND created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT object_name, object_size, object_color FROM virtual_objects WHERE object_type = 'Furniture' ORDER BY object_size DESC;
SELECT scene_name, scene_description FROM ar_scenes WHERE created_at < '2021-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY scene_name ASC;
SELECT inv.object_id, inv.scene_id, inv.quantity, v.object_name FROM object_inventory inv JOIN virtual_objects v ON inv.object_id = v.object_id WHERE inv.quantity > 10 ORDER BY inv.quantity DESC;
